string.text: Greetings Raven... Let's talk Business...

Hello to you, Marked One.. I have heard that the Bandits have found a hiding place full of weapons in the Dark Valley... The interesting thing about them though, is that they are from the late 19th and early 20th centuries... can you believe that?! You see they have been buried there since long before both World Wars... A few days ago, a couple of Duty members came to see Artyom for a snack, and told him all about it! I have this Client... an odd fellow from outside the Perimeter, that visits the Zone from time to time... a Collector of sorts... If I could only get my hands on some of those rare beauties!... I'd make a fortune!... If you find any 'interesting', or 'unique' weapons during your travels... come see me, and we can do business... I would certainly make it worth your while!
A rare HK-417 sniper rifle... you interested?
Here's an interesting piece - with a scope... what do you think?
This custom AK-74 belonged to 'Strelok'... it would be a shame to sell it...
Could I interest you in a customized Abakan Sniper?
A brand new model Fort-14 pistol... How about it?
How about an MP-5 rechambered for 9x18mm cartridges...
I can give you this 'Groza' assault rifle...
How does a Spas-12 sound to you?...
I can probably part with this here Winchester...
I have a very nice l85 Enfield assault rifle here if you want it...
How about an L300 'sniper'... very rare indeed!
I've got a nice SVD 'Dragunov' here for the taking...
This SIG550 assault rifle... a powerful piece! You want it?
I've got a nice Desert Eagle Mark XIX for you...
A true Assassin's choice... a silenced Colt1911... how about it?...
A nicely made AS Val 'shaft' with a scope attached... it's yours if you want it...
How about a silenced MP-5?
I've got a very nice Abakan 'assault' model... interested?
How about a 'weight reduced' Enfield l85 assault rifle?
This 'anomolous' AK-74u might interest you...
Camouflaged SIG 'sniper'.. You want it?...
A quite powerful, modified G-36 'Crystal'... interested?
This customized SVU "Kid" should interest you...
How does a Beretta M9A1 interest you?
Check out this unique VSS Vintorez... it's yours for the taking...
A nice, customized OC-14 'Groza' re-chambered to accept NATO cartridges... You want it?
I've got a nice RG-6 that fires NATO rounds... you like it?
How about a Walther - customized for 9x18mm rounds?...
I've got this nicely customized Makarov PM available...
Can I interest you in an RPG-7?...
I've got a 'Knights' SR25 Mk.11 Mod.0 - very hard to find! How about it?...
I managed to get my hands on this unique FAMAS... how about it?...
I've got a nicely customized Gauss Rifle... how about it?...
What about a sawn-off Shotgun?...
I found this pistol... You want it?...
Here is a Stechkin... Take it...
I managed to land my hands on this HK-XM8 'para'... You should have it...
How about an FN-2000 'Executioner... Nice weapon!
Certainly, Marked One... the Client will be pleased... here's your payment...
Well done, Marked One!... this is superb... Thanks!
Sounds good... I'll take it...
I will take the Abakan...
Quite a good pistol, I'll take it...
Thank you marked One!..
Always a pleasure to do business with you... here...
This is certainly a nice piece indeed!
This is most excellent, I'll take it!
Thank you for this... Nice Weapon!...
Sniper Rifles are my greatest weaness!... Thanks!
Good work my Friend... I'll take it!
A very nice SIG indeed... Thank you!
A nicley made Desert Eagle - I will certainly take that off your hands...
I'm always interested in silenced weapons for sure...
An excellent AS Val 'shaft'... you've got a deal...
Good find!... I'll take it...
How could I resist such a nice piece?!..
A nicely customized weapon... Thank You!
Even though it's a bit worn... I'll take it...
Camouflaged, huh?... Sounds good...
I'll gladly take this G36 'Crystal' off your hands...
Where did you find such a unique weapon?!... I'll take it!
A nice, powerful Beretta... Thank you...
I will never refuse a VSS... a good weapon...
A nice customized 'Groza'... give it here...
How can I refuse a 'Bulldog'?!... Thank you...
Very rare indeed! I'll take it...
A classic piece! hand it over...
This is excellent, Marked One... much appreciated!
I'll take the Sniper Rifle...
Thank you, Marked One!
Nice Gauss Rifle... hand it over...
This is geat... Thank you very much!
Not a bad weapon at all!... Pass it here!
I'm always interested in a Stechkin pistol...
Sounds good to me... you've got a deal...
Nice gun... I'll take it...
Nothing yet... Sorry..
Do you sell Weapons and Ammunition?

I have a decent selection of weapons available, and a small selection of ammunition...\n The people I work for prefer that I conduct my business strictly in exchange for Mutant body parts... So, I'm afraid your cash is no good here... Now then... Marked One, that's enough small talk... shall we talk business, or what?
What sort of ammunition do you have?...
Let's have a look at those weapons...

I can offer you the following:
 
1. Shotgun Shells in exchange for Pseudodog tails
2. 9x39mm cartridges in exchange for Blind Dog's tails
I'll take the Shotgun Shells...
I'll take the 9x39mm cartridges...

Here's what I have available:
 
1. Submachine guns in exchange for Burer's hands
2. Shotguns, a Desert Eagle, or an M4A1 in exchange for Controller's hands
Let's see the Submachine guns...
I'll have a look at the others...

5 Pseudodog tails will get you:
 
1. Three packs of 12x70 'buck'
2. Two packs of 12x70 'slug'
3. One pack of 12x70 'dart'...
 
Which will it be?
I'll take the 12x70 'buck'...
Give me the 12x70 'slug' ammo...
I think I'll take the 12x70 'dart' rounds...

10 Blind Dog's tails will get you:
 
1. Four packs of 9x39mm 'PAB9' cartridges
2. Three packs of 9x39mm 'SP5' cartridges
3. Two packs of 9x39mm 'AP' cartridges...
 
Which ones do you want?...
I'll take the 'PAB9' cartridges...
I'll take the 'SP5' sniper rounds...
I'll take the 'AP' rounds...

For four Burer's hands, I can offer you one of these:
 
1. Bizon
2. Kriss Super-V
3. MP-7a3
 
What will it be?
I'll take the 'Bizon' off your hands...
Perhaps I will try the 'Kriss Super-V'...
The 'MP-7a3' sounds interesting...

Two Controller's hands will get you one of the following:
 
1. TOZ-34
2. M4A1-Taktikal
3. Saiga-12k
4. Desert Eagle
5. BM-16 'Scattergun' 
 
The choice is yours...
Give me the TOZ-34...
Hand over that M4A1...
I've been looking for a Saiga 12k...
I will take the Desert Eagle...
The sawn-off BM-16 please...
I've changed my mind...
I don't have them right now... perhaps later...
I'm looking for some ammunition... and perhaps some better armor...
I sell Flamethrower mixture, armor, and ammunition as well...\nWhat exactly are you looking for?
I need some Flamethrower mixture...
Let's see the armor, and ammunition...

I can offer you the following:
 
1. Flamethrower mixture for 12 bottles of vodka
2. A full gas canister, or a Colloidal gas canister for five bottles of Vodka...
I'll take the Flamethrower mixture...
Let's see the Gas Canisters...

For 10 bottles of Vodka, I can offer you:
 
1. a choice of armored Suits...
2. Ammunition for the 'Groza' assault rifle...
I need some better armor...
Let's see the Ammunition...

So, we are in agreement then:
 
For 12 bottles of Vodka I can give you the Flamethrower ammo...
How does that sound?
Yes, I'll take the Flamethrower mixture...

For 5 bottles of Vodka, I can offer you:
 
1. a Colloidal Gas Canister
2. a full Gasoline Canister
 
Take your pick...
I'll take the Colloidal Gas...
Give me the Gas Canister...

10 bottles of Vodka will get you the following:
 
1. 'Guardian of Freedom' Suit
2. 'Duty' PSZ-9MD armor
 
What will it be?...
I'll take the 'Guardian of Freedom' Suit...
Give me the 'Duty' PSZ-9MD armor...

10 bottles of Vodka will get you the following:
 
1. 3 packs of 9x39mm 'PAB9'
2. 2 packs of 9x39mm 'AP'
 
What will it be?...
Give me the 9x39mm 'AP' rounds...
I'll take the 9x39mm 'PAB9'...
I've changed my mind...
Nothing for now... perhaps later...
Hello, what for good reason you want to turn?
Well, the Stalker, has found Krysjuka? PDA has brought?
is shorter, you has died Rats... PDA at it was not... To See, the young reptile was in time zanykat!

Your mother... Well, have presoaked Krysjuka - there to it and the road, is a pity PDA was gone... Though... No, stop! Krysjuk, before runaway, with the Vein long rubbed something, we can at it posproshat?
The Vein you speak? All right, 'posproshayu'...
Greetings, the Vein, you in a course of the latest news? Your friend - the Rat - a horse has set...
Krysjuk? Yes what there the friend... The earth to it... That it is necessary to You?
Yes business is to you... Concerning Krysyonysha...
That else for good reason?
is shorter, Borovs wants to find PDA Rats... But that skopytilsya... PDA at it at itself was not. Can kursanesh, what to what? And where now for it to search?
much that wants... More shortly, co-ordinates of several places of caches a Borov there are written down, I can share with you this information, if you something to me...
Has begun... And if I to you curtail a neck - to business will not help?
That to you?
Curtail, only it will not help you, PDA Rats I in a secret place zanykal. So look itself...
... Something you will bring... In the Bar oshivayutsya a bruise one, the hunter were, and so the weapon unique is available for it... It also is necessary to me!
it is fine, I will talk to the Hunter, but I promise nothing...
Yes you have gone! Have got! Go there, go here...
it is fine, I have joked - you have laughed... What there to you something?
I Have talked to the Hunter. He agrees to give you a gun but only if you to it of beer find.
That? Beer? Though... Can and will find, how many asks?
Two boxes can...

Eh, and I will not try to see some beer... Well it is fine, write down cache co-ordinates in Cordon. From Continent boys have adjusted, on my birthday, Zatar at Sidorovich near by... In general if you will bring a gun I to you I will tell where PDA...
Greetings, the Hunter! There is a request from one bandit...
From you that? More gangster physiognomy I yet did not see...
At the look, the drunk... More shortly, Urca one - the Vein, wants to buy a weapon from you. You will sell? If, of course, any more has not spent on drink it...

it is More wants than nothing? Yes I, yes for this gun... Though, the hell with him, all right... Let... e-e-e, beer to me will get... Cans commercials twenty... No, forty! More shortly, bring from it something useful then we will talk...
Beer? Yes you have gone balmy! Whence here beer? All right, I will transfer...
Greetings to you, the stray soul!
is more silent, the stalker, do not rustle, the head hoots... What is necessary?
it Has got beer!
That? Beer? What beer? A-a-a so I have joked... And it is generally fine, give here, pipes at me burn...
All forty cans? I can to myself I will leave cans of ten-twenty?
Well on, take away! The drunk unfortunate...
Prevail... Mine... Yours... More shortly, take away a gun and move with long loafs, the clever man!
He-he, leave certainly, and the hell with him, with your bandit...
Here, take the gun! It is happy?
Well you give, the brother! It is certainly happy!
And what about my share?

Your share waits for you on Agroprom... Here...\nStill there is a way of reception of the 'Medusa' from different stuff... Into an Electro it is necessary to throw a head of a jerboa, bandage, sausage and canned...
it is fine, I will check up... Look, you will deceive - I will tear, as Tuzik a hot-water bottle...
Hello, Borov, I have found PDA...
Well and... Where? Give!
And where my share?
There Will be your share, give already...
it is fine... Here PDA...

Frets, here to you a key from an underground and laying on one cache good. Truth humanity one, from which info has removed, rubbish was, a scoop nasty... But habarok should be good... In the north of Army warehouses, near the fallen helicopter...\nStill there is a way of reception of the Quirk - it is necessary bandage, canned food, a head of a jerboa and sausage in a Fruit Punch to throw...

Frets, here to you laying on one cache good. Truth humanity one, from which info has removed, rubbish was, a scoop nasty... But habarok should be good... In the north of Army warehouses, near the fallen helicopter...\nStill there is a way of reception of the Quirk - it is necessary bandage, canned food, a head of a jerboa and sausage in a Fruit Punch to throw...
Well it is fine. I look, you take a word... Still we will meet... While.
Greetings, Seryoga! How are you doing?

Yes what, to hell, affairs... Bandits the rod herd, and cartridges almost does not remain... The Two has sent in the Bar, behind ammunition - the second day to hearing, spirit, PDAs are disconnected, or zabuhali, or... The devil only knows...
Well I can help you... Here has brought a box with cartridges. Phew, what heavy, an infection, hardly the hemorrhoids to itself have not earned, while bore. Well, we will agree?
Give, we will agree... How many you ask?
For a zinc box - a box darling... Well as?
it is excellent, I take! Hold! You it, the Stalker... Will be still, come...
Somewhere I already heard it... Well it is fine, good luck!
Health I wish, General! Cartridges are not necessary?
Hi, the brother! Cartridges are always necessary to us...
Uf, what heavy, an infection, hardly the hemorrhoids to itself have not earned, while bore. Well, we will agree?
we Will agree... How many you ask?
For a box of cartridges - 20 first-aid sets... Well as?
it is excellent, I take! Hold! You it, the Stalker... Will be still, come...
Somewhere I already heard it... Well it is fine, good luck!
Hi, Lukash! The box of cartridges is necessary?
Hello, the dude! It is glad that you have decided it to bring to us. The superfluous box never will prevent!
Uf, what heavy, an infection, hardly the hemorrhoids to itself have not earned, while bore. Well, we will agree?
Well can and we will agree... How many you ask?
For a zinc box - 30 doses antirada... Well as?
it is excellent, I take! Hold! You it, the Stalker... Will be still, come...
Somewhere I already heard it... Well it is fine, good luck!
Greetings the Wolf! You of that here?...

Greetings, Marked One. So, I look behind affairs local, in case of barrier break should cause help from the Bar... You Know that only the army lamp can normally work in these anomalies... I to you on the big secret will tell, how it is possible for anomaly to liquidate, if they on a way are located... The Fanatic promised to bring, or the people to send... Only here neither to hearing, nor spirit from them... As to spite, communication with Cordon does not work! Well? You descend, you will look for the Fanatic?
it is fine, I descend...
I will not go, for certain the Fanatic himself has already sent somebody...
Hello, the Wolf, has found I the Fanatic.
That with it? Where a portable radio set?
The Portable radio set here, hold... And the Fanatic was wounded by mercenaries so it has sent messengers, yes those in the Bar have hooted...

Mmat, have relaxed they there without me... Well and it is fine - the main thing the portable radio set is delivered! Thanks you, Marked One!\nMeans - about anomalies: I only know, how Electro shlopnut - it is necessary to throw in it 'the Ruby Battery'...\nit is possible and with other anomalies it is possible so to arrive, it is necessary ways to search...
Greetings, Fanatic! Why has not sent the person to carry a portable radio set to the Wolf? He waits, hopes for you!

Forgive, Marked One, sent I here people, yes here are afraid, back resort! Has last time sent - so they, an infection not only that to stuff drunk have come, so still it... Have sown a portable radio set... And itself I can not, employments have hit... Yes on me camp, understand...
Well, the Fanatic, give recover... Where have sown that?
in general, somewhere behind the Hangar on a Garbage where there passes a trench, in which pipes roll... These greenhorns, probably, on the way to the Bar have sent it...
Greetings, Screw! I concerning a teleport...
About, Marked One! In general, I, on Max operating time, late, have collected a teleport on Yantar.
it is excellent! What it is necessary for you? I to you that you want in return...

Yes it is not necessary for me of anything, the grub suffices, vodka is, air fresh... The Woman, yes where you it will take...\nThough... Drive to Sakharov, he promised to throw fresh releases of the Playboy, we will look on heavenly creations...
Here fartsa a pancake, all right...
Well you give... Like, the adult muzhik...
Here magazines with beauties...
Thanks you, Marked One, and have already forgotten that - who it is a WOMAN...
On, remember...
Approach, when you will want to be transported to Yantar...
Hello, Professor...
Hello, Marked One, hows life...
Do you have any Playboy magazines?...
You must be getting lonely Marked One! Here's a Playboy from 2006, enjoy yourself...
Greetings, Screw, I need to fly on Yantar...
And that to you on a place it is not sat...
I cannot sit on a place - nature not that...
Eh, nature... The artefact "Mica" is necessary...\nAt me is not present, and at you?
Is certainly, here... The Jamb you will radiate?
did not think that is required - has sold...
Is not present, I will not be... It I so am simple, for the company just once... And for brainwork money I will take... Therefore, as any work should be remunerated...
And what compensation is necessary for you?
If it is strong brain to creak, and is guaranteed to throw out you in a safe place that 9000...\nAnd if not so you are afraid - that 2500 will suffice.\nSolve...
Give better in a good place try...
Listen, here to you 2500, on a place I will understand.
I Will keep money, itself I will reach...
For good compensation - worthy work...\nMove to a teleport. Opposite to a front entrance on base... Through road pass and you will see...
Live you will reach, and there work itself...\nWalk... The Teleportico opposite to a front entrance on base...
Greetings, whats with the sad face?

Greetings, Marked One... Im missing some of the pleasures of life that are difficult to get in the zone... For example, beer... Yes, yes, precisely, I want beer! In the Dark valley, theres beer... Will you go find me some? Bring at least 10 cans... I will give you something interesting for them, namely a recipe for the transformation of an artefact. The rookie any has brought PDA Jurika... The earth to it down...
Thats not a bad idea, I think I will also get some for myself. In the Dark Valley you say? Alright...
Sorry, Im not going anywhere near the bandits...
Greetings, Dan! Here, I have got the beer...
Well Marked One, you just made my day! Give it to me, you want a drink?
Oh yes, here you are, taste fresh...
Excellent beer - and it is fresh! I will put in your PDA the recipe...\nListen, Marked One... Is it possible to ask you to do something else?
Tell me what you need, I travel around a lot and just might be going that way...

Marked One... At the dump is this man Raven, well I already spoke to you about him... And so, I have ordered a sawn-off shotgun "BM-16". In exchange he has asked for this sack. Will you deliver it and pick up my sawn-off shotgun? You will receive a unique artefact that I dont think you've seen before!
The Raven? Alright, give me the bag, I will carry out this transaction...
Sorry, but I have to be on my way... Ask somebody else...
Greetings Dan! I have brought the weapon...
Excellent... Now that was easy work dont you think?
Traveling around the zone is not what I call easy... Here take the gun, I want to see my artefact!

Well thanks, Marked One! Now about the artefact, I dont have it on me. But I know precisely where it is. In the Forgotten Wood you will see some red barrels, thats where you will find the "Emerald Medusa". However, Watch out for Chimeras and other mutants.
Well, Dan...So much for easy work!...
Hello Raven... I brought you this sack from Dan...Or should I say "happy sack".
Well... I guess you know my "plans" for the evening...
Well, here, catch and give me the sawn-off shotgun...
Greetings, Fox, I have brought an Exoskeleton... As well as agreed...
Greetings! Listen, Marked One, we agreed that you to me will bring a new suit! And you that have brought? And for nothing this stuff is not necessary to me... Go, repair, and then and we will talk!
Eh, is no place to disappear, I will go, I will repair...
Hi, Bes. I have found Bronicas... wear-resistant... While has found hardly most 'have not worn out'...
The Stalker, you for whom take me? That has found the armor, has strengthened and has brought, of course, thanks... But, yet you will not repair it is conversation will not be!
it is fine, Bes, now podremontiruyu and I will bring...
Hi, Syak, I have brought the SLOPE... The Excellent, standing thing...
Aha, was... You that with it have made? Marked One, give I've at first darn it, and then approach - these rags are not necessary for me!
it is fine, are not hot, now all will be...
Here.. Miser, take the Cobblestone Armor...
Marked One, what for affairs such? What have dragged my Cobblestone through! Stomped on by a Pseudo-giant? I will not take this crap, I expect things to be in GOOD condition at least!
Has understood, I will fix! Only do not grumble...
Hello, Petruha! here's the TOZ...
How can I use this shabby gun to fight mutants and bandits? Please repair it and then return!
Okay, you ungrateful ass, I will get it repaired...
Greetings, Yurek! Here you are!
Marked One! I respect you for saving my life, but it doesnt mean that you can give me bad equipment... Please, repair it for the sake of decency...
Okay Yurek, dont be angry. I will repair it!
Guide, I have brought a thunder-storm, as agreed...
Marked One, in which garbage heap did you find this? Bring me a fully repaired weapon!
I forgot your a greedy bugger, I will repair it and return...
Greetings Freeman! Take the "the Desert eagle"...
Marked One, what the hell did you do to my gun! You need to repair the "Eagle"!
Damn Yankee, I will repair!
General! I have brought the "Bulldog"...
Stalker, would you pull your head out of your ass! What kind of scrap metal have you dragged here! Get this repaired and then come back and we will talk!
Well, I will get it repaired...
Hi! Here your wonderful pistol!
Hi, the brother! I see, you have pulled about it... Give, fraternally, descend, repair, then come...
All right, well, we will not quarrel...
Greetings, the Miser! Accept "Bulldog"...
The Dude, this piece of iron is not necessary to me - give, result it in an appropriate kind, well there clean, tint... Then I will take...
it is good, wait. Now patch up also I will bring...
Greetings Dan! I went to Raven, and brought your sawn-off shotgun...
Marked One! be a real friend and get this weapon fixed, I will not accept!
Sorry Dan, I will come back when its fixed...
Greetings, the Vein! I descended to the Hunter... Here your gun!
The Brother, you that, for the sucker take me, me have decided to throw? Nafig a garbage you push? You give, to begin with, at least repair it, then pobazarim!
Mmat... Has noticed nevertheless... All right, wait, I will soon bring!
Hey there Sid... did you miss me?!

Marked One.. I heard how you have helped around here... In return, I'd like to offer you some of my Services... namely upgrades: I can have 'Night Vision' installed for you on certain armor... not the best quality available, but it's the best I can do with the supplies I get around here!\n \nI can also have armor strengthened by adding a protective layer containing certain particles from the 'Pellicle' artefact... this will give you better protection against certain elements... even though it may still feel the same as before. This treatment is not all that expensive either... Well worth the money, I say!
Thank you Sid, this is very much appreciated!
What armor upgrades do you have available?

'NIGHT VISION'.. but, only one kind - Standard Green: It can only be equipped on Jackets and Raincoats... and not if they are too badly damaged... I can also strengthen Jackets using a special method developed by some Eggheads I help out from time to time with Vodka, and other essentials...
 
Upgrade Costs:
PNV = 10000 Roubles
 
Jacket Reinforcement:
 
Regular Jackets = 5000 Roubles
Modified Jackets = 10000 Roubles
Regular Raincoats = 15000 Roubles
Modified Raincoats = 20000 Roubles
 
Let me know if you are interested...
I'm interested in purchasing some 'Night Vision'...
Do you want it installed on a Regular Jacket, or a Reinforced one?
Install it on the Regular Jacket...
Which Jacket do you want the 'Night Vision' installed on?
Install it on the Regular Jacket...
Install it on the Dark Raincoat...
Install it on the Light Raincoat...
Install it on the Brown Jacket...
Install it on the Leather Jacket...
Install it on the Bandit Jacket...
Install it on the Red Bandit Jacket...

Install it on the Blue Bandit Jacket...

Install it on the Brown Bandit Raincoat...
